channel.title: Need help. Shops And Quest. Help Needed Bad. :o
channel.description: I need help with changing what my shop keepers say. I want to change the messages like " Welcome to Armour Shop." to something else. I also want to change and make some quest. Could you tell me what folders to go to please. I have already tried Client.java and found nothing :/ so im confused. Help please. XD
